name: Airpods pro 2
description: AirPods Pro (2nd generation) with USB-C deliver up to 2x more Active Noise Cancellation than the previous generation, with Transparency mode that enables you to hear the world around you, and all-new Adaptive Audio that dynamically tailors noise control to your environment.

name: iphone 14 Pro Max
description: The Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max 5G comes with a 6.7-inch ProMotion technology touchscreen, features Crash Detection and a new Truedepth 48-megapixel front camera with Photonic Engine, an extra hour of video playback compared to last year's model and a new Action mode that provides smoother looking videos with better image stabilization.This is all powered by the Apple A16 Bionic chipset and 6GB of RAM.

name: Macbook Air M2
description: MacBook Air. Don't take it lightly.Supercharged by the next-generation M2 chip, the redesigned MacBook Air combines incredible performance and up to 18 hours of battery life into its strikingly thin aluminum enclosure.

name: Puma Unisex-adult's Sneaker
description: PRODUCT STORYA classic sneaker is always an easy pick to complete your casual outfit. The PUMA Baseline shoes have been created, keeping conventional sneaker design intact. Flaunting the branding on point are the PUMA wordmark on the tongue and the stitched PUMA Formstrip. Made of synthetic leather upper and rubber outsole to offer ease at every stride.DETAILSFully synthetic leather upperRubber outsole for gripPUMA basket design on the heel collarPUMA cat logo on the tongue

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra 5G AI Smartphone
description: The new Galaxy S24 series offers a unique user experience with integrated Galaxy AI functions that simplify life. The new processors are designed specifically to enhance AI capabilities, productivity, and gaming performance, while being more energy-efficient.

name: Apple Watch Ultra
description: The most rugged and capable Apple Watch. Designed for outdoor adventures and supercharged workouts with a lightweight titanium case, extra-long battery life, and the brightest-ever display. Featuring double tap, a magical way to interact with Apple Watch, and Precision Finding to guide you to your iPhone.
